reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Promoting alternative financing models and reforms to support the development of the infrastructure financing sector in India.

description.narrative: Assessing procedural constraints and identifying ways to facilitate the development of the infrastructure financing sector, highlighting London as a partner for raising finance to meet India's financing needs.
